Reachy Mini.text:
WHAT: Reachy Mini is the first open-source desktop robot designed to explore human-robot interaction and creative custom applications.
CATEGORY: AI applications, open-source hardware and software integration.
FEATURES: Companion bot, $299 price, self-assembly, ready to ship by end of summer, rapid prototyping, simulation and real-world intelligence, community apps, customization, sharing on Spaces, simulation availability, beta tester notification, pre-order starting July 9, 2025, delivery in batches this fall through late 2026.

Reachy Mini Lite.text: WHAT: Reachy Mini Lite is a version of the Reachy Mini with external compute, compatible with Mac and Linux, wired power, 2 microphones, 5W speaker, wide angle camera, no accelerometer, 6 degrees of freedom head movement, full body rotation, 2 animated antennas, delivery starting late summer 2025.

products.NOTE: Reachy Mini Lite is a beta version.

company.text:
NAME: Pollen Robotics
LOCATION: Mountain View, California, USA
POSITIONING: Leader in AI, robotics, and development projects, focusing on bridging simulation and real-world intelligence.
